nodes.text: The Theselon system was located in the Interior Region, an area of the Hapes Cluster in the Slice portion of the Inner Rim. It was connected via hyperlanes to the Baldavia and Millinar systems. The Theselon system was the origin point of the article of clothing known as the Theselonian bridal gown.
The Theselon system was introduced in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square O-9.
